title: nee paadamulE
sahitya:
nI pAdamulE gatiyani nIrathamunE namminAnurA 



(nI pAda)







anupallavi







kApATuDa nIkarudA (nannu) kAmita phaladAyaka rAma 



(nI pAda)







caraNam







parama dayAkaruDani nIdu paluvidhamugA morabeTTukonna



vara bhaktula brOvalEdA vara prada shInivAsa varadA 



(nI pAda)
